s: Shopping for dinnerware sets online offers you tons of options choices, the ability to compare prices, and convenience. Of course, you also run the risk of a set arriving with broken pieces, but in our experience, the majority of pieces have arrived intact. Our go-to retailers include Williams Sonoma, West Elm, and Food52 for their curated collections and brand exclusives, though we’ve also ordered our favorite brands, including Staub, from Amazon...
